title: Crime Alert 12.21.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.21.18
description:
Middle school teacher only gets a short prison sentence after her lawyers argue the student she was having sex with was a “willing participant”. A federal judge dismisses a defamation lawsuit brought by businessman Aleksej Gubarev against Buzzfeed News.   New York City Medical Examiner  finds no evidence of foul play after mom  is found dead in the trash chute of her luxury apartment building.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
